name: Chinatown Alleyway Tours (CATs)
description: CATs is a paid job opportunity where youths are trained to become tour guides. The youths learn researching and marketing strategies to educate tourists and community members about the daily life, rich history, and modern-day issues of San Francisco’s Chinatown by highlighting the triumphs of the community while sharing their personal stories about preserving Chinatown.
